post.body: wishing my house was warmer than an ice box.
glad you likee the music. sorry for the lack of liner notes, but for sure no lack of love.
or maybe "king of the pansies"
twitting. twirping. tweeping. i'm doin it ALL baby.
going to the chapel, then to the postal office. watch out tsz and jasp. prepare to be blown. away.
she don't use jelly, but she do use jam. anyone want to come out here and help me make some? it's a gd berry-thon.
ice water, fly swatter, gonna getcha through the day.
orchestrating a music disc takes a lot of brain cells for the bethers.
i picked me some broccoli and beans and peas. in your FACE vitamin b12.
thinking about little smokies, gin and our great nation. pow!
150 people drinking in the desert = 3 kegs, 4 cases of cold white wine and a shitload of gatorade. also, maybe a saltlick.
can you see this jim? also, can you see the future, because that would be more helpful.
don't worry jim, you already are on mars. uh huh.
the only good this about your hair falling out, is that your armpit hair falls out, too. this does not apply to men. then, it's even worse.
but my artichoke looks prickly and robust.
my rhubarb is shriveling just like my brain.
i'm waiting for jim to stop peer pressuring me. also, i had some delicious stir fry for lunch. i'm waiting for the drizzle to stop.
burping up thai food and wondering how jasp gets me to do things i don't trust or like.
christmas eve. when baby jesus wants us all to make a giant ham and maybe drink a tom and jerry or two...
oh freys. do travel safely. we need you back here for new year's. you're supplying the cheese... don't leave us stranded.
ass snow. yes. it's what we do best out here. it's fluffy and beautiful. just like my merkin.
shoveling some deep ass snow. it's a northwest winter wonderland fo sho.
seattle? dinner? hungry? i say for sure, food. maybe something expensive if you get to expense it...
oh the weather outside is frightful... but i say bring on that mother fuckin snow!
